{"blocks":[{"key":"ssqj","text":"Store the cryotubes into CoolCell LX Freezing Container in a   freezer   before permanent storage in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2D8575F0CBF511EC9E8AB34B0DF99080","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"345D5280CBF511EC9E8AB34B0DF99080","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}
